tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_engagement (
  engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  channel_id INT,
  engagement_time TIMESTAMP,
  engagement_type TEXT,
  engagement_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    social_media_handles JSON
);

CREATE TABLE customer_engagement (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    platform_id INT,
    engagement_type VARCHAR(20),
    engagement_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    join_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_channels (
    channel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    channel_name VARCHAR(50),
    platform VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE customer_engagement (
    engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    channel_id INT,
    engagement_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    engagement_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE engagement_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    engagement_id INT,
    reach INT,
    likes INT,
    shares INT
)

CREATE TABLE custom_strategies (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    strategy_description TEXT,
    strategy_date DATE
)
